mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_configuration(test_id, num_of_message, min_message_size_in_kb, max_message_size_in_kb, range_std_dev, start_time) VALUES (#{testId}, #{numOfMessage}, #{minMessageSizeInKb}, #{maxMessageSizeInKb}, #{rangeStdDev}, #{startTime})

INSERT INTO test_result(test_id, message_id, success, error_message, message_size_in_kb, serialized_size_in_kb, topic_id, created_at) VALUES (#{testId}, #{messageId}, #{success}, #{errorMessage}, #{messageSizeInKb}, #{serializedSizeInKb}, #{topicId}, #{createdAt})
